parties: Wadduwage Sunil Wijayananda    Vs   Nekathimulla Manannalage Wasantha    Pushpakumara
keywords: Breach of the peace - Identity of corpus – Possession within the relevant period –Absence of exceptional circumstances that shock the conscience of the High Court Judge.
